ai-ne16:3.1_0: “The world is beaten down by ignorance,
ai-ne16:3.4_0: I declare you the dried up,
ai-ne16:4.1_0: “The world is surrounded by ignorance, trapped in its shells, not a box.
ai-ne16:4.2_0: “Who is it with few wishes, content, secluded, he gets the Buddha to dispel negligence. And when he wants to defend it, he doesn’t clean it, and the Buddha cleansed it to remove it?”
ai-ne16:4.3_0: “I’ve pulled away by the armpit,” “I catch,” the Buddha pulled away with damaged away, but the Buddha isn’t cleansed.
ai-ne16:4.4_0: “What’s the consequence of such a wicked, greedy deed, and undertakings, he prepares a meal.
ai-ne16:4.5_0: That’s why the Buddha is hindered by ignorance,
ai-ne16:5.5_0: Who is crossing over to the hunt?”
ai-ne16:7.1_0: “Marks on all sides, blazes, closeness, and poets in the world. The Buddha is cleaned in the world, not cleansed. And he dispels the bladder, and not cleansed.
ai-ne16:7.2_0: “The restraint and declare to be restraint. If you understand restraint, others do as he decrees, but think of restraint ...
ai-ne16:7.3_0: “That’s why the Buddha is said to be in the world.”
ai-ne16:8.4_0: When asked me whether I’m asked,
ai-ne16:11.2_0: That’s why he asked this question.”
ai-ne16:11.3_0: Where there is purity, he’s confident, settled, and decided.
ai-ne16:11.4_0: And wherever there is no fault-finding, he hasn’t been expelled.
